product_name: L'OrealRevitalift Triple Power Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganGive BackL'Oréal Revitalift Triple Power Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer is an anti-aging face moisturizer to visibly reduce wrinkles, firm and brighten skin in 1 week with Pro-Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C.
details: DetailsBenefitsAnti-aging face moisturizer to visibly reduce wrinkles, firm and brightenImmediately: skin feels softer, smoother and plumped with hydrationIn 1 week: Wrinkles are visibly reduced, firmness is noticeably improved, skin tone is brighter, texture is renewedNon-greasy, absorbs quicklyFeaturesDaily Moisturizer with: - Pro-Retinol, a stabilized retinol derivative that works alongside the other ingredients in this formula to visibly reduce wrinkles and firmVitamin C, a vital antioxidant known to boost skin's radianceHyaluronic acid, a potent hydration-attracting molecule naturally found in skin to enhance moisture levelsParaben free, Allergy tested, Mineral oil free, Dye Free, Does not clog poresDermatologist tested suitable for sensitive skinItem 2249191How To UseEvery morning and evening, smooth over the face, neck, and jawline until thoroughly absorbed. For best results, use with other Revitalift products.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau Glycerin Isohexadecane Isopropyl Isostearate Niacinamide Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate Nylon-12 Dimethicone Cetyl Alcohol Polyethylene Stearyl Alcohol Cetearyl Alcohol Stearic Acid Behenyl Alcohol Phenoxyethanol Synthetic Fluorphlogopite Palmitic Acid Polyacrylamide Capryloyl Salicylic Acid Sodium Acrylates Copolymer Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide Peg-100 Stearate Caffeine Ascorbyl Glucoside C13-14 Isoparaffin Cetearyl Glucoside Dimethiconol Tocopherol Sodium Hyaluronate Retinyl Palmitate Disodium Edta Sodium Hydroxide Parfum / Fragrance Laureth-7 Adenosine Myristic Acid Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate Sorbitan Oleate Tin Oxide Benzyl Salicylate Benzyl Alcohol Coumarin Linalool Ceteareth-6.
how_to_use: Every morning and evening, smooth over the face, neck, and jawline until thoroughly absorbed. For best results, use with other Revitalift products.
ingredients: Aqua / Water / Eau Glycerin Isohexadecane Isopropyl Isostearate Niacinamide Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate Nylon-12 Dimethicone Cetyl Alcohol Polyethylene Stearyl Alcohol Cetearyl Alcohol Stearic Acid Behenyl Alcohol Phenoxyethanol Synthetic Fluorphlogopite Palmitic Acid Polyacrylamide Capryloyl Salicylic Acid Sodium Acrylates Copolymer Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide Peg-100 Stearate Caffeine Ascorbyl Glucoside C13-14 Isoparaffin Cetearyl Glucoside Dimethiconol Tocopherol Sodium Hyaluronate Retinyl Palmitate Disodium Edta Sodium Hydroxide Parfum / Fragrance Laureth-7 Adenosine Myristic Acid Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate Sorbitan Oleate Tin Oxide Benzyl Salicylate Benzyl Alcohol Coumarin Linalool Ceteareth-6

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Good product for my skin.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer that delivers as promised!
reviews.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.  This moisturizer is packed with vitamin C, retinol, and hyaluronic acid to make my skin feel smooth and it softens lines and wrinkles too. It delivers as promised!  It comes in a heavy jar with an easy open lid and has a nice light scent that's isn't overpowering.  The cream is thick and a little goes a long way.  My skin feels amazing and firm after using this for just a week!

reviews.headline: Good at first
reviews.comments: At first I thought it would be too heavy, but while it goes on kinda thick, it blends well. Been using for a couple weeks and no wildly noticeable different. But I also don't use the other two recommended products for maximum effect. Sadly the price point will prevent me from continuing use after this jar. Also after maybe three weeks, I started getting very large pimples on my face and neck. Mid-40s is too old to be dealing with that. So obviously it's too heavy for my skin.

reviews.headline: Simple ingredients and a perfect moisturizer
reviews.comments: Super cute packaging for This type of products! A smooth texture that is easily absorbed into the skin. My skin feels so smooth so it clearly is effective! With having sunscreen in it- it doesn't smell like it does!

reviews.headline: I am not a fan of this product
reviews.comments: First off I'm not a fan of the plastic insert there was so much product in there. Secondly it felt like I'm rubbing sunscreen on my face. Thirty minutes after I applied this product my eyes started burning. I'm definitely not a fan.

reviews.headline: Daily moisturizer
reviews.comments: I'm thrilled to have found a moisturizer that not only provides exceptional hydration but also helps to firm and lift sagging skin. I'm eager to continue using this product and witness its ongoing benefits. Its lightweight, fragrance-free texture makes it a pleasure to apply, while the added SPF provides protection and a smooth canvas for makeup.

reviews.headline: awesome
reviews.comments: Excellent Moisturizer! I love it! My skin just drank it up. My cheap daily moisturizer leaves my face feeling greasy and sweaty until it gets fully absorbed, but this product did nothing of the sort. It soaked into my face so fast, and my skin feels so much softer after using it. I love that it is anti aging and full of ingredients to keep my face looking younger. I would absolutely recommend it!

reviews.headline: Pretty good face cream.
reviews.comments: I can see I slight difference in my face after using it still a little to early to tell. Not very greasy or oily. The cream has a silk like texture and the scent of pleasant.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I can't attest to the degree of skin improvement as I haven't been using it long enough, but it leaves my face feeling silky and hydrated without being oily.

reviews.headline: Spf and hydrating moisturizer!
reviews.comments: This is such a good moisturizer especially considering the price! It's rich in texture, very soft and plumping. Love how instantly moisturized my skin feels. And also it is spf 30! Very good product and for a great price

reviews.headline: Greasy feeling
reviews.comments: After using this for a few weeks, I found the formula to be just too thick. I wasn't pleased with the greasy feeling it left on my face. I also broke out pretty bad after the first use. It doesn't have any scent really which is nice. I like the tub style packaging, makes it easy to use every drop.

reviews.headline: Hydrating and light
reviews.comments:
This product was provided for free in exchange for my honest opinion.
This moisturizer provides great hydration without the heavy feel. It has SPF 30 sun protection which makes it great for day use and sun damage protection. It has a pleasant scent and it layers great with my makeup.

reviews.headline: Decent
reviews.comments: I received this in exchange for my honest opinion. I used this for almost a week before reviewing it. I really enjoyed the smell and texture of this. As far as if it helps to prevent wrinkles, I'm not sure. I honestly didn't notice any change in the appearance of my fine lines. It kept me nice and moisturized throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Hydrating, protective, effective.
reviews.comments: Thank you Ulta for the free product, I truly love it. L'Oréal Paris Triple Power Face & Neck Moisturizer SPF 30 delivers impressive hydration, firms skin, and protects with SPF. Lightweight yet rich, it absorbs quickly, leaving skin smooth and youthful. Excellent value for high-quality results!

reviews.headline: Pretty good face cream
reviews.comments: So I recently received this cream and really can do a full review. I've used the cream and the texture is smooth. No annoying smells. I felt like it was a nice cream that was somewhat working, but I would need to use it a bit longer for a very accurate review. I received this free on Influencer and excited to keep using.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Love this moisturizer from L'Oréal I used this for quite sometime to see the results and it does not disappoint.  My skin felt immediately hydrated after using and looked refreshed.  I applied this to my face and neck and noticed my skin looks younger it's full of vitamin C as well as pro retinol it has 30 SPF which protects my skin from the sun. Cute little glass container simple and sweet.

reviews.headline: Not greasy
reviews.comments: First, the packing definitely draws my eye. It looks high end. I really like the smell and the smooth texture of this creme. I feel like there has been a slight improvement in my overall texture and glow of my skin. I don't see much improvement with existing fine lines, but I wasn't expecting much for the old ones. Just hope it improves my skin to prevent some new ones. The only thing I didn't like is the jar that you dip into. I prefer a pump. I think pumps are more sanitary. But overall great product that i will continue to use.

reviews.headline: Great daily face & Neck Moisturizer
reviews.comments:
I went a little out of my comfort zone with this product as i don't normally reach for drug store skin care products. It comes nicely packaged in a glass jar ( very impressed by that) It has a pretty heavy sunscreen scent which doesn't bother me. 
The product is creamy, and upon application soaks right in without leaving greasiness or a white cast from the sunscreen. The skin on my neck felt softer right away which blows me away. The wrinkles on my forehead seem to not look as harsh after only a few days of use. Let this be a lesson to us all that we don't have to break the bank to find a good skin care product that shows up and does what they say it will do! If I could change anything, I could do without the sunscreen scent. 
* user tip- Put on after your shower to help the HA lock in additional moisture. 
* I received this product complimentary for reviewing purposes.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't repurchase
reviews.comments: It has a lightweight texture to it & feels good on the skin. It does have a sunscreen scent, that doesn't bother me, but I do think some people would hate it. I do not think I would repurchase. It's just ok.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: This L'Oreal Paris triple power face and neck moisturizer is nice and has simple packaging. It makes your skin feel good and the scent isn't bad.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using Revitalife Moisturizer for a month  or so and I am very pleased at the change in my complexion. I am 75 years old this year, and I was experiencing some loss of integrity of my skin on my face. I know! It's expected at my age, but I am a youthful-looking person and I was so disappointed to see that! This moisturizer has really helped that. I don't mind some of the wrinkles - goes with the territory, right? But this helps so much and I am grateful to have found it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Just what I needed

faceoff_negative.comments: This lovely moisturizer works well after cleansing my face, and I massage it in...but after I apply it, it rolls off my face when I apply makeup base, as if it is part of the process of wearing the moisturizer. This ends up causing me to appear to have a skin condition or dandruff when, in truth, I only have plain dry skin. LOVE the product! But is this reaction normal? Thanks for any tips.
faceoff_negative.headline: This lovely...
